coreAttributes.name: Chiappa Rhino
coreAttributes.description: Chambered in the powerful .357 Magnum Cartridge it is one of the more powerful revolvers available. The most distinctive features are it's rather futuristic look and that it fires from the bottom of the cylinder rather than the top which are both very uncommon in revolvers
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] revolver, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful arcane bullet!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a powerful blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] revolver, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] revolver, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] revolver and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
